meanings.definition: Generally supposed or believed to be true
meanings.sent1: The reputed magician amazed the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent2: She is a reputed expert in the field of astronomy.
meanings.sent3: The reputed haunted house turned out to be a fun tourist attraction.
meanings.sent4: His reputed speed on the track earned him the nickname 'Flash'.
meanings.sent5: The reputed treasure hidden in the cave sparked excitement among the explorers.

meanings.sent1: The reputed restaurant always serves delicious food.
meanings.sent2: He is a reputed lawyer known for his integrity.
meanings.sent3: The reputed superhero saved the day once again.
meanings.sent4: Her reputed kindness towards animals touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The reputed artist's paintings are highly sought after by collectors.

meanings.definition: Said or believed to be such
meanings.sent1: The reputed heir to the throne made a surprise appearance.
meanings.sent2: The reputed winner of the contest was announced last night.
meanings.sent3: The reputed ghost in the old mansion turned out to be a prankster.
meanings.sent4: Her reputed intelligence in solving puzzles impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The reputed source of the rumor finally revealed the truth.
